MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich,  affecting properties in Bent Lane, Kingsley Road, Norley Lane and surrounding areas Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a snapped pole and grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.34AM on 16th November 2020
